snippet: - Pablo Zabaleta's first goal in two years and another from David Silva ensured Manchester City beat Watford 2-0 to keep up their pursuit of Chelsea at the top of the Premier League....

headline.main: Zabaleta and Silva End Manchester City's Home Blues
headline.print_headline: Zabaleta and Silva End Manchester City's Home Blues

lead_paragraph: - Pablo Zabaleta's first goal in two years and another from David Silva ensured Manchester City beat Watford 2-0 to keep up their pursuit of Chelsea at the top of the Premier League.

snippet: - Chelsea maintained their awesome progress, winning a 10th successive Premier League game with a 1-0 victory over Sunderland at the Stadium of Light on Wednesday that saw them forge six points clear at the top of the table....

headline.main: Ten in a Row for Chelsea Who Surge Six Points Clear
headline.print_headline: Ten in a Row for Chelsea Who Surge Six Points Clear

lead_paragraph: - Chelsea maintained their awesome progress, winning a 10th successive Premier League game with a 1-0 victory over Sunderland at the Stadium of Light on Wednesday that saw them forge six points clear at the top of the table.

snippet: Bournemouth will leave their Dean Court home and are looking for a site to build a new stadium in time for the start of the 2020-21 season, the Premier League club said on Friday....

headline.main: Bournemouth Announce Plans to Leave Dean Court
headline.print_headline: Bournemouth Announce Plans to Leave Dean Court

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth will leave their Dean Court home and are looking for a site to build a new stadium in time for the start of the 2020-21 season, the Premier League club said on Friday.

snippet: - Mark Hughes endured a difficult night in his 400th match as a Premier League manager but ended up proud as his Stoke City side battled for over an hour against Southampton with 10 men to earn a 0-0 draw on Wednesday....

headline.main: Ten-Man Stoke Battle to Earn Draw With Southampton
headline.print_headline: Ten-Man Stoke Battle to Earn Draw With Southampton

lead_paragraph: - Mark Hughes endured a difficult night in his 400th match as a Premier League manager but ended up proud as his Stoke City side battled for over an hour against Southampton with 10 men to earn a 0-0 draw on Wednesday.

snippet: Roger Federer and Serena Williams are not going to participate in the third edition of the International Premier Tennis League because of financial issues for the exhibition series....

headline.print_headline: Federer, Williams Out of IPTL Because of Financial Issues

lead_paragraph: Roger Federer and Serena Williams are not going to participate in the third edition of the International Premier Tennis League because of financial issues for the exhibition series.

snippet: Jordan Henderson is pleased with Liverpool's new-found defensive resilience after their castigated back-line kept clean sheets in the recent Premier League victories over Middlesbrough and local rivals Everton....

headline.main: Henderson Delighted With Liverpool's Defensive Resolve
headline.print_headline: Henderson Delighted With Liverpool's Defensive Resolve

lead_paragraph: Jordan Henderson is pleased with Liverpool's new-found defensive resilience after their castigated back-line kept clean sheets in the recent Premier League victories over Middlesbrough and local rivals Everton.

snippet: Arsenal's bench is proving a potent weapon in the club's gathering Premier League title push with Saturday's 3-1 victory over Stoke City offering further evidence of the enviable options available to Arsene Wenger....

headline.main: Arsenal's Supporting Cast Fuelling Title Push
headline.print_headline: Arsenal's Supporting Cast Fuelling Title Push

lead_paragraph: Arsenal's bench is proving a potent weapon in the club's gathering Premier League title push with Saturday's 3-1 victory over Stoke City offering further evidence of the enviable options available to Arsene Wenger.

snippet: The fixture known to locals as 'El Classicoast' may never have been the most passionate local derby in English football, but that did not lessen the disappointment of Bournemouth fans at Sunday's 3-1 Premier League home defeat by Southampton....
lead_paragraph: The fixture known to locals as 'El Classicoast' may never have been the most passionate local derby in English football, but that did not lessen the disappointment of Bournemouth fans at Sunday's 3-1 Premier League home defeat by Southampton.
